column1: in memory of dallas ray norman -- gentry family funeral service| send card dallas ray norman october 28
column7: 2015 at his home. he was born october 28
column8: 1926 in forsyth county to the late cleveland zebulon norman and dolly ector reich norman. in addition to his parents
column9: he was also preceded in death by his wife
column18: wilbur norman. surviving is his son
column30: chris gibby; 22 great grandchildren; several nieces and nephews. his funeral service will be held 11:00 a. m. tuesday
column32: 2015 at gospel light baptist church by the rev. bobby roberson and the rev. joseph brown. burial will follow at sedge garden united methodist cemetery. the family will receive friends one hour prior to the service from 10:00 to 11:00 a. m. at gospel light baptist church. memorials can be made to community home care and hospice
column35: nc 27215. gentry family funeral service in yadkinville is serving the norman family. online condolences can be made at www. gentryfuneralservice. com.
